body:
Features and Enhancements

Cost Impact
  • Export Out of Network Reallocation Detail
    • Select Out of Network Details from Export options
  • Analysis Results Provider Summary - Filter by Provider
    • Click in the field under the Provider header and begin typing the provider name.
  • Analysis Results Provider Summary - Filter by Specialty
    • Click in the field under the Specialty header and select from the list.
  • Analysis Results Provider Summary - Filter by Location
    • Click in the field under the Location header and begin typing any part the address.
  • Analysis Results Provider Summary - Sort Savings by $
    • Click on the $ header to sort Savings $ ascending or descending.
  • Analysis Results Provider Summary - Sort Savings by %
    • Click on the % header to sort Savings % ascending or descending.
  • Analysis Results Provider Summary - Add Client ID to provider lookup search
    • Client Id has been added as a search option in the blue Lookup search field.
    • If a provider has multiple Client Ids, the provider will be found with any associated Id.
Competitive Access
  • Add ProviderLocationID to Competitive Access recruiting list

Issues Fixed

Rank Networks
  • Fixed an issue where the user received a 500 error when sharing a ranking
